text: Alloh taolo ast, ki osmonhoro ʙiduni sutunhoe, ki onhoro ʙuʙined, ʙarafrost, on goh ʙar Ars qaror girift va xursedu mohro ʙa xidmat [-i inson] gumostaast, ki har jak to zamone muajjan dar [madori xud] ravon ʙosand. U kor [-i cahon]-ro tadʙir mekunad va ojoti [xes]-ro ʙa ravsani ʙajon medorad, ʙosad, ki ʙa didori Parvardigoraton jaqin pajdo kuned
